An example of building *metacells* using [SEACells](https://github.com/dpeerlab/SEACells) algorithm. 
*Data:* cell lines from [Tian et. al, 2019](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-019-0425-8), the same as for the first tutorial (https://github.com/GfellerLab/SIB_workshop/blob/main/workbooks/Cell_lines.md)
